member.name: TBBUTTONINFOA
member.summary: Contains or receives information for a specific button in a toolbar.

member.name: TBBUTTONINFOA.cbSize
member.summary: Size of the structure, in bytes. This member must be filled in prior to sending the associated message.

summary.para: Set of flags that indicate which members contain valid information. This member must be filled in prior to sending the associated message. This can be one or more of the following values.

listheader.description: Value
Meaning
Version 5.80. The wParam sent with a TB_GETBUTTONINFO or TB_SETBUTTONINFO message is an index, not an identifier.
The idCommand member contains valid information or is being requested.
The iImage member contains valid information or is being requested.
The lParam member contains valid information or is being requested.
The cx member contains valid information or is being requested.
The fsState member contains valid information or is being requested.
The fsStyle member contains valid information or is being requested.
The pszText member contains valid information or is being requested.

summary.para: Image index of the button. Set this member to I_IMAGECALLBACK, and the toolbar will send the TBN_GETDISPINFO notification code to retrieve the image index when it is needed.
Version 5.81. Set this member to I_IMAGENONE to indicate that the button does not have an image. The button layout will not include any space for a bitmap, only text.

member.name: TBBUTTONINFOA.fsState
member.summary: State flags of the button. This can be one or more of the values listed in Toolbar Button States.

member.name: TBBUTTONINFOA.fsStyle
member.summary: Style flags of the button. This can be one or more of the values listed in Toolbar Control and Button Styles.

member.name: TBBUTTONINFOA.cx
member.summary: Width of the button, in pixels.

member.name: TBBUTTONINFOA.lParam
member.summary: Application-defined value associated with the button.

member.name: TBBUTTONINFOA.pszText
member.summary: Address of a character buffer that contains or receives the button text.

member.name: TBBUTTONINFOA.cchText
member.summary: Size of the buffer at pszText. If the button information is being set, this member is ignored.
